item.description: A structured roadmap to learn Data Structures and Algorithms the right way and why it matters beyond interview preparation

item.title: Analysis of Time Complexity Explained with Python Examples
item.description: A beginner-friendly and practical guide to understanding time complexity with clear explanations and Python examples written as plain text.

item.title: Array Patterns for Problem Solving
item.description: A structured guide to common array problem-solving patterns, helping you identify the right approach instead of memorizing solutions.

item.title: BFS vs DFS Explained Clearly
item.description: A detailed and conceptual explanation of Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Depth-First Search (DFS), covering their working principles, differences, complexities, and real-world applications.

item.title: Binary Search Explained Clearly
item.description: A clear and structured explanation of binary search, including how it works, requirements, examples, complexities, and interview insights.

item.title: Complete Python Programming Syllabus (Beginner to Advanced)
item.description: A structured Python programming roadmap from zero to professional level, covering fundamentals, core concepts, advanced topics, and real-world applications.

item.title: Concept of Dynamic Programming Explained Clearly
item.description: A clear and conceptual explanation of Dynamic Programming, focusing on overlapping subproblems and optimal substructure with intuitive examples.

item.title: Different Sorting Algorithms Explained Clearly
item.description: A structured and easy-to-understand explanation of major sorting algorithms, their working ideas, time and space complexities, and real-world usage.

item.title: Recursion Explained from Basics
item.description: A clear and beginner-friendly explanation of recursion, covering how it works, its components, types, advantages, disadvantages, and use cases.

item.title: Searching in Arrays (Sorted and Unsorted)
item.description: A clear and practical guide to searching techniques in arrays, explaining linear search and binary search with concepts, complexities, and real-world use cases.

item.description: A structured roadmap to learn Data Structures and Algorithms the right way and why it matters beyond interview preparation

item.title: Welcome to the Codeverra Blog
item.description:
Welcome to the Codeverra blog.

This space is where I’ll share:

  • clear explanations of core concepts
  • problem-solving approaches
  • learning strategies for Python, DSA, and AI
  • notes that go deeper than short-form content

Start here (recommended)

If you’re new, start with this video where I explain how I approach teaching and learning:

Learning playlists

Here are some curated playlists you can follow:

Python & DSA

Leetcode with Python in Hindi #100DaysOfLeetcode

More structured posts and learning paths coming soon.
